Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ (\{ 6, 1 \}), (\{ "h1", "\
\\\\
\
The Minaeci Serpents\\\r\\n\\\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "h3", "\
\\r\\n\\\r\\n\ - An Elite Order of Tradesmen \& Reconnoiterers - \\\r\\n\\\r\\n\\\r\\n" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Mission\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nA branch grafted from the roots of Liaron Minaeci's clan, the Serpents make their base of operations in the bustling metropolis of Triskellian under the direction of Velesa Il'Anuis.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nCreated for the sole purpose of empowering mercantile communities, the Serpents exist to generate resources and opportunities for the common man. Being altogether sympathetic to the hardships vendors face, this Guild works hand-in-hand with infant businesses and tradesmen to both establish connections and offer financing.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\How is this accomplished?\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nIf you are an unaffiliated individual with an underdeveloped talent, we will personally take you under our proverbial wing. Understanding that the competition is steep, we will allow apprentices to study fiercely with our experienced trainers and avail themselves of applicable assets. Should a student require a loan to foot the cost of their initial supplies, we will immediately offer such with a mere 2% interest rate.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nAt the completion of being groomed for service in the greater pond of opportunity that is Triskellian, we shall aide individuals in finding the Guild or Household that best suits their capabilities. Our pupils will have undergone top-notch training in both the function of their particular talent as well as how to assimilate to the culture and law of the land. Said Guild or Household will then offer the Serpents a nominal fee for procuring a new hopeful that may be added to their roster.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\What is the benefit of using your service as opposed to simply recruiting?\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nConsidering the amount of time, effort and coin which goes into the recruitment process, the perk of using our agency is invaluable. For a simple fee, a Guild or House may enter into a signed agreement with the Minaeci Serpents that will include precisely the specifications they desire for the position that must be filled. We will handle all correspondence, training and the efficient introduction of the person to your staff.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\What if the business relationship does not work and the person must be terminated?\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nWith sincerest apologies, the Serpents will refund 100% of fees charged to your Guild or House and endeavor to find a more suitable employee.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\Full exemption from the original fee will be granted in the following scenarios:\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n1. Our referral offends the laws of the land in such a way that the Guild or House is charged a single fine or fines adding up to 20 denarii. (In these cases, kindly keep a receipt from the Reeve for verification)\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n2. Our referral willfully damages or steals property belonging to their sponsoring Guild or House.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n3. Our referral attempts to do bodily harm not related to self-defense or sanctioned duel to any member of their Guild or House.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n4. Our referral offends the law in any manner that causes incarceration for more than 7 consecutive days.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n\What positions will you fill?\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nThe Serpents will gladly work with people that desire to become or oppositely need any of the following:.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nSeamstresses\
\\r\\nTailors\
\\r\\nStonemasons\
\\r\\nJewelers\
\\r\\nBlacksmiths\
\\r\\nGuards\
\\r\\nSecretaries/Administrative Assistants\
\\r\\nErrand boys/girls\
\\r\\nSlaves\
\\r\\nAll other possible positions may be cleared through contact with Velesa Il'Anuis directly.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n" \}) \})

(\{ (\{ 6, 2 \}), (\{ "text", "\
\\\\
\
The Minaeci Serpents\\\r\\n\\" \}), (\{ "paragraph", "\Mission\\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\

Understanding that the competition is steep, we will allow apprentices to study fiercely with our experienced trainers and avail themselves of applicable assets. \\r\\n\\r\\n1. Our referral offends the laws of the land in such a way that the Guild or House is charged a single fine or fines adding up to 20 denarii. (In these cases, kindly keep a receipt from the Reeve for verification)\

\\r\\n\
\\r\\nSeamstresses\

\\r\\nErrand boys/girls\
\\r\\nSlaves\
\\r\\nAll other possible positions may be cleared through contact with Velesa Il'Anuis directly.\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n" \}) \})
